item.title: Installing Linux Packages Offline
item.description: 1. Introduction Hi there ðŸ˜Š. Another day, another post. Today, I thought it would be useful to share some tips and tricks when installing new software on a standalone linux machine / VM. For cybersecurity researchers that have to adhere to company policy to disconnect research machines from the internet, this post will be useful for your future workflows. Before I begin the walkthrough, it is important to have 1 internet-connected machine that is of a similar OS Version to the offline machine so as to minimize incompatibilities between systems.
